name: finra-broker-check
description: Programmatically run searches against FINRA's Brokercheck database for acquiring Licensed Rep and Brokerage Firm data. I didn't see any documentation for their API, so I figured I'd try my hand at making a wrapper for their search tool. Users are able to run queries using the BrokerCheck API to look up Firms as well as Registered and Licensed Reps.
author: whats-a-handle
